.class public auto ansi sealed TreeNodeEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub TreeNodeEventHandler(sender As Object, e As TreeNodeEventArgs)
public delegate void TreeNodeEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, TreeNodeEventArgs ^ e);
type TreeNodeEventHandler = delegate of obj * TreeNodeEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 控制項之 、、 或 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the , , , or event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需有關事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來以程式設計方式註冊事件處理方法的委派。The following code example demonstrates how to use the delegate to register an event-handling method programmatically. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewTreeNodeEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewTreeNodeEventHandler/CS/treeviewtreenodeeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewTreeNodeEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewTreeNodeEventHandler/VB/treeviewtreenodeeventhandlervb.aspx#1)]
